text: We’re thrilled to be joining Mana Tech and to have the opportunity to operate at a whole new scale.
name: Charly Esnal

text: Mana Wynwood Convention Center is more than just a venue; it’s a dynamic space where creativity and community come together. I’m excited to lead our efforts in making each event here a memorable experience, shaped by the energy and innovation that Wynwood is known for.
name: Vanja Plavša

text: Mana Fashion Services is here to unite and uplift Miami's fashion community. As we bring together industry resources and talent, we’re building a collaborative hub where fashion professionals can thrive and grow.
name: Aleksandra Sivokoneva
